h2_title: Marsh of the White Mist Awaken Wine Worms
content: Once you reach Chapter 3, you can revisit the Monkey at his cave in the Marsh of the White Mist and purchase more Awaken Wine Worms from him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Awaken_Wine_Worm_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Awaken Wine Worm Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Marsh of the White Mist Awaken Wine Worms'.
The content is as follows:
Once you reach Chapter 3, you can revisit the Monkey at his cave in the Marsh of the White Mist and purchase more Awaken Wine Worms from him.
